name: Das Boot
overview: An inexperienced U-boat crew has to survive a secret mission and a young German woman is torn between loyalty for her home country and the French resistance in the WWII drama.
tagline: When boys become men in a war that can't be won.

episodes.name: New Day
episodes.overview: An inexperienced U-boat crew are plunged into a perilous secret mission, while new translator Simone starts work at the base.

episodes.name: Secret Mission
episodes.overview: Hoffmann insists on further training despite the crew's desire to head to battle. In La Rochelle, Simone pieces together the previous night's events.

episodes.name: Incurred Losses
episodes.overview: Tennstedt and Hoffmann continue to butt heads aboard U-612, while rebel Carla Monroe plans a mission in La Rochelle.

episodes.name: Doubt
episodes.overview: Unity on U-612 has crumbled and Hoffman and Tennstedt's continued conflict could jeopardise the mission. On land, Simone wrestles with a difficult choice.

episodes.name: Loyalty
episodes.overview: A surprise new arrival takes Greenwood's place, causing a divide. Plus, Carla and Simone grow closer and a resistance fighter arrives at the safe house.

episodes.name: Against the Clock
episodes.overview: Things look bleak for the crew of U-612, as they desperately try to work out their next move. Simone adjusts to her new position between Carla and Forster.

episodes.name: Hell
episodes.overview: Forster reveals to Simone that U-612 has gone missing. Meanwhile, the resistance endanger the innocent to further their cause.

episodes.name: Reckoning
episodes.overview: The U-boat crew struggle with recent events and what lies ahead. A revelation in La Rochelle infuriates Forster spelling bad news for Simone.

episodes.name: Survival Strategies
episodes.overview: Hoffmann struggles to hang on as his chance to escape heads toward US shores. Margot pushes on with her plans.

episodes.name: Inconvenient Alliances
episodes.overview: When Johannes' plan emerges, Gluck knows only one man is capable of stopping him. Margot needs help to get the Goldblatts out.

episodes.name: Sabotage
episodes.overview: Tensions build beneath the ocean as Wrangel continues his pursuit of U-822. In New York, Sam takes drastic measures.

episodes.name: The Dice Has Fallen
episodes.overview: An attempt to get his crew on side has serious consequences for Johannes. Margot finds a vital ally as Forster reaches St. Remy.

episodes.name: Command to Kill
episodes.overview: Keen to impress his superiors, Forster cracks down on Anatole's wayward behaviour. Wrangel finally has his arch rival in sight.

episodes.name: Final Decisions
episodes.overview: Johannes and Wrangel try to bring their crews into line. Despite his growing love for Cassandra, Hoffmann seeks an escape route.

episodes.name: Head to Head
episodes.overview: Wrangel catches up with Johannes, leading to a dramatic showdown out in the Atlantic. Hoffmann shows up at Cassandra's place.

episodes.name: On the Other Hand
episodes.overview: Hoffmann struggles to hang on as his chance to escape heads toward US shores. Margot pushes on with her plans.

episodes.name: A Second Chance
episodes.overview: Spring 1943: L.I. Ehrenberg prepares submarines for use in Kiel. Minors are recruited as crews. Wilhelm Hoffmann attends a reception at the request of his son-in-law.

episodes.name: New Commands
episodes.overview: Forster is investigating the village man murder case in Lisbon. In Kiel, the new sailors of the U-949 get into battle. Royal Navy captain Swinburne is travelling to Liverpool for his son's funeral service.

episodes.name: The Tide Is Turning
episodes.overview: The U-949 is in danger during a test drive due to Commander Buchner's orders. Forster comes across a trail in a casino and makes the acquaintance of the German Bettina Gruber.

episodes.name: War By Other Means
episodes.overview: While Swinburne sets sail with a technologically upgraded ship, Ehrenberg makes a serious decision in Kiel. Forster has to create a traitor out of the country.

episodes.name: In Depth
episodes.overview: After Wilhelm Hoffmann learned the truth about his son Klaus, he gets into a fight with Hannie. Ehrenberg has to say goodbye to Greta. In Portugal, Forster's plan gets out of hand.

episodes.name: Encircled
episodes.overview: Swinburne's destroyer sinks two submarines on the Atlantic, then he hunts U-949. Forster observes a secret meeting between consul Gruber and the American Gardiner.

episodes.name: The Enemy of My Enemy
episodes.overview: U-949 meets a Japanese boat to take over heavy cargo - gold. Wilhelm Hoffmann receives an invitation to Lisbon. Forster betrays Klaus Hoffmann under duress what he knows.

episodes.name: Fool‚Äôs Gold
episodes.overview: After a bomb explosion, Forster and Klaus Hoffmann hide with the Portuguese Ines, while Wilhelm Hoffmann arrives in Lisbon. U-949 is heading for their new destination.

episodes.name: The Sailor‚Äôs Psalm
episodes.overview: Klaus Hoffmann pursues the German agent Weiss and discovers valuable information. U-949 is under heavy fire from Swinburne's destroyer - until Commander Buchner dares a manoeuvre.

episodes.name: A Real Submarine Man
episodes.overview: The U-949 reaches Portugal and unloads the gold. When Ehrenberg returns to Kiel, he finds Greta with her husband again. Klaus Hoffmann and Forster reach their goal through blackmail.
